title: Biden Promotes Plan Aimed at Tackling Meat Prices
sub_head: President met virtually with farmers and ranchers as his administration looks for ways to ease inflation
body:
President Biden met virtually with farmers and ranchers Monday to discuss efforts to boost competition in the meat industry and reduce prices for consumers, as his administration looks for ways to address higher costs for goods and services.
The presidentâ€™s push to tackle meat prices comes as his administration seeks to ease inflation, which hit a nearly four-decade high in November.
